member.name: M:Rock.MyWell.MyWellGateway.GetSupportedHostedGatewayModes(Rock.Model.FinancialGateway)
member.summary: Gets the hosted gateway modes that this gateway has configured/supports. Use this to determine which mode to use (in cases where both are supported, like Scheduled Payments lists ). If the Gateway supports both hosted and unhosted (and has Hosted mode configured), hosted mode should be preferred.
member.value: The hosted gateway modes that this gateway supports

member.name: P:Rock.MyWell.BillingPlanParameters.BillingCycleInterval
member.summary: "How often to run the billing cycle. Run every x months"

member.name: P:Rock.MyWell.BillingPlanParameters.BillingFrequency
member.summary: "How often run within a billing cycle. See . Note: Use then set and to make Every Week and Every Other Week schedules as shown on https://sandbox.gotnpgateway.com/docs/api/#bill-once-every-7-days-until-canceled and https://sandbox.gotnpgateway.com/docs/api/#bill-once-other-week-until-canceled.

member.name: P:Rock.MyWell.BillingPlanParameters.BillingDays
member.summary: If BillingFrequency = , this is the days of the month to bill (for example "1,15" for the 1st and 15th). If BillingFrequency = , this is the day of the month to bill on (for example "10" for the 10th of every month). If BillingFrequency = , this is the X number of days ( 7 for weekly. Note, for every 2 weeks, also 7, but 2 for BillingCycleInterval )

member.name: P:Rock.MyWell.BillingPlanParameters.Duration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration (the number of times to do the recurring payment, or 0 to specify forever)

member.name: P:Rock.MyWell.BillingPlanParameters.Amount
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount in Dollars (and sets )

member.name: P:Rock.MyWell.BillingPlanParameters.AmountCents
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount (in cents)

member.name: P:Rock.MyWell.BillingPlanParameters.NextBillDateUTC
member.summary: Gets or sets the next bill date in UTC time. Note that this field is just called "next_bill_date", but it is really in UTC time.
